review: Streaming takes high speed internet. Servers have been down once where internet wasn't an issue but the media couldn't be connected to. Will update later at another time if that continues, for now has only happened once. Would like video that costs to be separated more from other videos.
author: Buyer2345

review: Best thing I ever bought. I take it everywhere. I know i could just use my phone to watch tv. But this make my life easier. Plug it into any tv that I can get it into , hop on the first avalible Wi-Fi signal. And watch what I want or  my kids favorite shows. It works well at grandma's house.
author: angus35

review: I have 150 Mbps internet speed and this thing still buffers its ass off. I've done everything I  can do and still buffers. Junk go with something else and don't waste your money. Amazon missed the boat on this thing.
